verses.text: Give unto the \sc Lord\sc*, O ye mighty, Give unto the \sc Lord\sc* glory and strength.
Give unto the \sc Lord\sc* the glory due unto his name; Worship the \sc Lord\sc* in the beauty of holiness.
The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* upon the waters: The God of glory thundereth: The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* upon many waters.
The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* powerful; The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* full of majesty.
The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* breaketh the cedars; Yea, the \sc Lord\sc* breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* divideth the flames of fire.
The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* shaketh the wilderness; The \sc Lord\sc* shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
The voice of the \sc Lord\sc* maketh the hinds to calve, And discovereth the forests: And in his temple doth every one speak of \add his\add* glory.
The \sc Lord\sc* sitteth upon the flood; Yea, the \sc Lord\sc* sitteth King for ever.
The \sc Lord\sc* will give strength unto his people; The \sc Lord\sc* will bless his people with peace.
